item.description:
Okay, so the Monday Night Meetup yesterday was so much fun and it was Game 6 (who knew? Obviously NOT me!). That we're doing it again for Game 7!!!!!!!!!

This will be a little loose. The game starts at 8pm, but anyone can go earlier and secure a seat and/or spot at the bar - whatever you'd like to do! I know there are several people who can't get there until later so just say in your RSVP what time you're going to be there. If you want to get there earlier, great! PLEASE RSVP, so we can find each other - although that's usually not too hard, we're very friendly.  All are welcome, come early, come late......but you know the drill and know what to do!!!

Whiskey Republic is very large inside and has TV's everywhere and plenty of space. So its a great place to watch the game (or even not watch it) and there isn't a bad seat.

Hope to see you Wednesday night!!!!

PLEASE DON'T FORGET TO RSVP!!!!!
item.how_to_find_us: I will get there about 9:00 due to a meeting - if someone can host earlier please say so in your RSVP!
item.name: Stanley Cup Playoffs - Game 7 at Whiskey Republic!
